places.name: Botanical Garden
places.description: This beautiful botanical garden is a famous tourist spot. It's one of the landmarks of the city.

places.name: Tangua Park
places.description: A famous park in the city, know for it's beautiful views and peaceful atmosphere.

places.name: Barigui Park
places.description: The most park in the city, famous for it's capibaras who walk freely in the park.

places.name: Oscar Niemeyer Museum
places.description: MON, the museum dedicated to the famous brazilian architect Oscar Niemeyer is a hot spot for tourists.

places.name: Arame Opera
places.description: A monument to music, where many world famous artists have performed. Cozy atmostphere for families.

places.name: German Bosque
places.description: With a path and walk inspired by children books, the German Books is always filled with tourists and families.

places.name: Athletico Paranaense Arena
places.description: The stadium for the biggest football team in Paraná.

places.name: Memorial Ucraniano
places.description: A memorial for the Ukranian people in Paraná which is the largest outside Ukraine.
